name: Deepspace2
description:
Deepspace2 v3.2

Fly though deep space in one of 9 varied ships, explore the infinite universe, Trade, mine and fight your way to victory 

First version: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/760368100/

Based on Scratch engine, Playable on Turbowarp:

Turbowarp: https://desktop.turbowarp.org

Get updates and give ideas on our discord:  https://discord.gg/aPfeXAegwA

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJThfPXcLTqXPxNptPacWNw
